name: b2009
description: This is a website using MERN for my old schoolmates batch to update their current status, their info, their slam info, ability to create articles, view others and much more.

scripts.build: concurrently "cd batch2009-react && yarn build" "cd batch2009-api && yarn build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd batch2009-react && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd batch2009-api && PORT=8080 yarn start"

author: SakaSaiTrinath
